sentences.sContent: Ralph Waldo Emerson was an American philosopher, poet, lecturer, and essayist.
sentences.sContent_eng: Ralph Waldo Emerson was an American philosopher, poet, lecturer, and essayist.
sentences.sCn: 爱默生是一位美国的哲学家、诗人、演讲家及散文家。

sentences.sContent: Historian, essayist and political publicist, he was the editor of several underground “samizdat” periodicals and was arrested and imprisoned several times for his pro-democratic activities.
sentences.sContent_eng: Historian, essayist and political publicist, he was the editor of several underground “samizdat” periodicals and was arrested and imprisoned several times for his pro-democratic activities.
sentences.sCn: 他身为历史学家、散文家和政治宣传家，曾担任几个地下刊物的编辑，并因从事民主活动而多次被捕入狱。

sentences.sContent: Borges, a short-story writer, poet and essayist, died in 1986 without the Nobel.
sentences.sContent_eng: Borges, a short-story writer, poet and essayist, died in 1986 without the Nobel.
sentences.sCn: 博尔赫斯死于1986年，这位短篇小说作家、诗人和散文家没有获得诺贝尔奖的垂青。

synos.tran: 随笔作家，散文家；评论家

trans.tranCn: 随笔作家，散文家；评论家
trans.tranOther: someone who writes essays giving their ideas about politics, society etc
